articles.title: Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 6th National Conference of Judicial Officers Tuesday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets and bowed to the statues.

articles.title: Vietnamese Embassy Officials Do Friendship Labor
articles.content:
Vietnamese Embassy Officials Do Friendship Labor
 Sariwon, October 24 (KCNA) -- Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Pham Viet Hung and staff members of his embassy did friendship labor at the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province Tuesday.
					 The guests visited the Migok Revolutionary Museum where the leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are displayed.
					
					 Then they helped farmers with rice-threshing.
					
					 They handed over aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Symposium on Kim Jong Un's Work Held
articles.content:
Symposium on Kim Jong Un's Work Held
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A symposium took place at the Central Hall of Workers here to mark the first anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Duty of the Working Class of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the Times and the Tasks Facing Trade Union Organizations".
					 The symposium heard treatises proving the validity and scientific accuracy of the idea and theory set forth in the letter sent by the Supreme Leader to those attending the Seventh Congress of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK).
					
					 The debaters said that Kim Jong Un's work serves as an immortal programme showing the road ahead of the general federation as required by the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The federation is a mass political organization of the working class founded and steadily developed under the energetic leadership and deep trust of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and a powerful combat unit for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, they noted, adding:
					
					 Modeling the whole federation on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is essential to constantly developing it into a mass political organization of the great leaders and creditably discharging the historic mission it assumes in modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Intensifying the guidance of the organizational and ideological life is a firm guarantee for preparing all members of the federation as genuine Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists.
					
					 It is an important task facing the federation to actively enlist the working class and its members in the building of a powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Present at the symposium were Choe Hui, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials and members of the federation.

articles.title: Day of UN Observed Here
articles.content:
Day of UN Observed Here
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- An event took place here to mark the Day of the United Nations on Tuesday.
					 Attending it were the UN resident coordinator and UNDP resident representative and members of missions of international bodies here.
					
					 Present on invitation were officials from the DPRK Foreign Ministry, Ministry of Public Health, Ministry of Land and Environment Protection, Ministry of Agriculture, diplomatic envoys and members of foreign embassies here and members of the European Union Programme Support, the Development Cooperation Mission of the Italian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation here. 
					
					 Displayed at the event were photos and books introducing the cooperative activities conducted by missions of UNDP, UNICEF, UNFPA, UNFAO, WFP and WHO.
					
					 The participants talked to each other about further boosting the exchange and cooperation among international bodies and organizations in various fields.
					
					 On the same day, the UN resident coordinator and UNDP resident representative hosted a reception.

articles.title: National Exhibition of IT Achievements of University Students Opens
articles.content:
National Exhibition of IT Achievements of University Students Opens
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of information sci-tech achievements made by university students opened with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex on Tuesday.
					 Presented to it are at least 1,500 inventions and IT products.
					
					 Attending the opening ceremony were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Ri Chung Gil, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, officials concerned, officials of the youth league and university students.

articles.title: Remodeled Kosanjin Revolutionary Museum
articles.content:
Remodeled Kosanjin Revolutionary Museum
 Manpho, October 24 (KCNA) -- The Kosanjin Revolutionary Museum has been remodeled.
					 The museum houses historical data on President Kim Il Sung's energetic activities for making a decisive turn in the Fatherland Liberation War. During his stay in Kosanjin from early November to mid December, Juche 39 (1950), the hardest war time, he advanced operational tasks for a counter-attack against the enemy.
					
					 The successfully remodeled museum will add glory to the exploits the President performed by leading the war to victory and help the Korean army and people learn about the history of ever-victorious Juche Korea.

articles.title: Conservation of National Cultural Heritage in DPRK
articles.content:
Conservation of National Cultural Heritage in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Three years have passed since respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un made public a historic work "National Heritage Conservation Is a Patriotic Undertaking for Adding Brilliance to the History and Traditions of Our Nation" on October 24, Juche 103 (2014).
					 The work deals with the issue of regarding idea and theories of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on national heritage conservation as guidelines and embodying them thoroughly. It also indicates the tasks and ways of conserving national heritage.
					
					 For three years since the publication of the work, many successes have been made in national heritage conservation.
					
					 The National Authority for the Protection of Cultural Heritage has pushed ahead with the work for excavating and restoring historical remains and relics and preserving them well.
					
					 It restored Ssanggye Temple in Myonggan County, North Hamgyong Province, Kunja Pavilion in Kumya County, South Hamgyong Province and Inphung Pavilion in Kanggye City, Jagang Province to their original states
					
					 It also set up a razor shell sanctuary in Thaethan County to conserve and propagate razor shells.
					
					 It newly listed goshawk of Toksong County, Jongphyong Duck, Ryongchon Cavern and Kwangphojong Duck in South Hamgyong Province, Chimgyo Mineral Water and Kumsujong Spring Water of Mt Jongbang in North Hwanghae Province and Masikryong and Taehwabong spring waters in Kangwon Province as natural monuments and Lake Songun Ryongrim in Jagang Province as a national beauty spot.
					
					 It is making multimedia programs "Illustrated Book of Korean Natural Monuments" and "Illustrated Book of Korean Beauty Spots".
					
					 It registered more than 100 objects of great value in cultural history as the national and local intangible cultural heritages and completed a program illustrated with photos and videos of 80 intangible cultural heritages.
					
					 It excavated a piece of metal type in Manwoldae, Kaesong City in 2015 and four pieces last year, contributing to enriching a treasure house of national cultural heritage.

articles.title: Exhibition Propels Work for Putting Sports on Scientific Basis
articles.content:
Exhibition Propels Work for Putting Sports on Scientific Basis
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The 21st National Exhibition of Sports Scientific and Technological Achievements served as an important occasion which propelled the work for putting sports on a scientific basis.
					 The number of visitors grew 1.5 times as compared with the 20th exhibition last year.
					
					 On display at the exhibition were a program for supporting sports training at juvenile sports school, football-throwing tool, model warship, watch-shaped pulsimeter and pedometer and many other sports apparatuses.
					
					 What merits attention was a general evaluation system for selecting sports players.
					
					 Officials and working people of different sectors also presented many excellent exhibits.
					
					 This showed that the work for putting sports on a scientific basis has been conducted as a massive work.

articles.title: Pothonggang Electronic Products Factory
articles.content:
Pothonggang Electronic Products Factory
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The Pothonggang Electronic Products Factory in the DPRK is producing modern IT products conducive to the development of the country's IT industry and the people's cultural and emotional life.
					 Among them are Pothonggang-trademarked liquid crystal TVs and Pyolmuri-trademarked computers.
					
					 Curved TV and 3D TVs are enjoying popularity among users for their peculiar appearance, visible angle and screen quality.  
					
					 Pyolmuri-trademarked computers are widely being used in educational units and industrial establishments for their high technical performance.
					
					 The factory has the Pothonggang Electronic Products Exhibition.
					
					 Now, it is putting spurs to the development of new products, true to the idea of the Workers' Party of Korea on breaking through the cutting edge.

articles.title: Pressure Can Never Browbeat DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Pressure Can Never Browbeat DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its vassal forces are making desperate efforts to check the dynamic advance of the nuclear power of Juche.
					 However, neither aggression nor challenge can browbeat the DPRK and nothing can undermine the firm will of the army and people of the DPRK to brilliantly accomplish the historic cause of building a nuclear force of the state while foiling the enemies' moves to provoke a nuclear war and sanctions and pressure racket with a firm hold on the line of simultaneously developing the economic construction and the building of a nuclear force, Rodong Sinmun says in an article Tuesday.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The hostile forces are calculating that applying maximum pressure in military, economy and all other fields would make the DPRK kneel down, but they are seriously mistaken.
					
					 No matter how much the U.S. and its followers ratchet up pressure on the DPRK and how much the world may change, nothing can dampen the faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to open up the way to victory with a firm hold on the independence line.
					
					 The vicious moves for a nuclear war on the part of the U.S. will further harden the will of the army and people of the DPRK to bolster the nuclear force for self-defence in every way and this will only result in speeding up the completion of the state nuclear force.
					
					 Remaining unchanged is the faith and will of the DPRK to maintain the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts and step up the socialist construction no matter how much the situation may change and what difficulties and trials they may face.

articles.title: Minju Joson Derides U.S. Forces in Poor Shape
articles.content:
Minju Joson Derides U.S. Forces in Poor Shape
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Tuesday comments on the shape of the U.S. forces billing itself as the "world's strongest."
					 According to the commentary, an opinion poll found that sailors of the Cruiser Shiloh under the U.S. 7th Fleet are all stricken with horror, uneasiness and discontent. The respondents said it is the matter of time that something terrible would happen and they feel as if they were in a ball park to see whether the warship would be destroyed first or its sailors would die first and as if they were in a floating prison.
					
					 As for the U.S. 7th Fleet, it claims to be a pivot of the U.S. missile defense system, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 However, sailors of the hell-like cruiser are forced into combat duty in hot spot waters. Naturally, they suffer from serious melancholia and extreme fear and some of them even commit suicides.
					
					 While GIs are trembling with war-phobia, citizens in the U.S. mainland are busy building underground bunkers and buying gas masks in a bid to escape miserable deaths. This is just the present situation of the U.S.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Trump-led ruling quarters of America are crying out for "total destruction" of the DPRK demonstrating its might as a power, failing to mind that poor situation. This is just as stupid as trying to break a stone with an egg.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Wild Rhetoric of S. Korean Unification Minister
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Wild Rhetoric of S. Korean Unification Minister
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, in a document expressing "policy stand" presented to the "National Assembly" shortly ago, called on south Korea to "promote fundamental and peaceful settlement of the north's nuclear issue" as a "key party" responsible for the Korean peninsula issue and pledged to create "conditions for the dialogue for denuclearization" by proposing the initiative for peaceful settlement of the Korean peninsula and "make efforts to lead the north into denuclearization negotiating table through powerful sanctions and pressure" together with the international community.
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Tuesday says that the "policy stand" touted by the puppet Unification minister is sophism that does not deserve even a passing note as it is just a revised version of the policy of "maximum pressure and engagement", a product of the hideous hostile policy of the U.S. toward the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet unification ministry again cried out for the impossible "parallel development of sanctions and pressure with dialogue", an indication of the sinister intention to totally deny the rights to sovereignty, existence and development of the fellow countrymen and to realize the dirty confrontation ambition with the help of the U.S., the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It will be a waste of time to sit with a waiting maid serving the aggression-minded outsiders.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the puppet forces' plan to put the DPRK's "nuclear issue" on the north-south negotiating table and realize the "denuclearization talk" through "sanctions and pressure" is a pipe dream.
					
					 The puppet unification ministry should clearly know that it can never shake off the ill fame as "idler ministry", "confrontation ministry" and "division ministry" earned during the office of traitor Park Geun Hye, if it is set to maintain the confrontation policy, with no heed paid to the serious warning of the DPRK.

articles.title: Remarks of S. Korean Chief Executive and Defense Minister Denounced
articles.content:
Remarks of S. Korean Chief Executive and Defense Minister Denounced
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Recently the chief executive of south Korea told those of "diplomatic delegation of assemblymen" which visited the U.S. master that "it is necessary to agree with the U.S. pressure upon the north." Meanwhile, Song Yong Mu, puppet minister of defense, visited the U.S. nuclear submarine Michigan to call for "demonstrating the might of south Korea-U.S. cooperation."
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary ridicules the remarks calling for confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north as rubbish made by the colonial slaves who serve the worldly ridiculed lunatic in the White House.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Though the south Korean puppet authorities have tried to curry favor with the U.S. master, they have been subjected to contempt, cold treatment and huge damage.
					
					 It is clear to everyone that what would be brought to this land by applauding for the old lunatic who is trying to ignite a nuclear war together with war maniacs of the U.S.
					
					 Although the south Korean puppet authorities try to frighten the DPRK by resorting to more frantic anti-DPRK pressure campaign with the backing of the U.S., the army and people of the DPRK will never be afraid of it. 
					
					 They would be well advised to behave themselves, clearly mindful that they cannot escape the most miserable end together with the U.S. master if they run amuck in confrontation racket, depending on the U.S. which is at the door of doom.

articles.title: Japan's Past Crimes against Humanity Can Never be Written off: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Japan's Past Crimes against Humanity Can Never be Written off: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- There was a ceremony of unveiling a statue of a sexual slave girl for the Imperial Japanese Army in Manhattan, New York State, U.S. some days ago. This is the fourth place housing the statue after California, Michigan and Georgia in the U.S.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary says that history of crimes can never be written off and the international community never tolerates it no matter how desperately the Japanese reactionaries may try to conceal them.
					
					 The Japanese authorities have resorted to all sorts of despicable moves to withdraw the statues, displeased with the erection of the statues symbolic of the crime related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army one after another in their ally country U.S., the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Japan was only greatly disgraced in the world while trying to realize their intention with a petty amount of money.
					
					 The reason that Japan reacts so sensitively to the erection of the statues and goes desperate to withdraw them is that it is afraid of its hideous crimes against humanity highlighted in the world and that it wants to evade international pressure for redemption of the past.
					
					 Ridiculous is the Japanese reactionaries' calculation that their past crimes can be put into oblivion of history forever.
					
					 Japan's past crimes are not an issue that can be glossed over or put into oblivion of history. The crimes related to the sexual slavery are an insult to humankind, a total denial of it and a challenge to justice and conscience.
					
					 No matter how desperately the Japanese reactionaries may struggle, they can never conceal the hideous crimes against humanity committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past and they will certainly face stern punishment by history.

articles.title: Minju Joson on Objective and Principle of UN
articles.content:
Minju Joson on Objective and Principle of UN
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Tuesday dedicates an article to the Day of the United Nations.
					 Referring to the circumstances of the UN foundation, the article says:
					
					 For at least seven decades after the birth of the UN, wars, disputes, armed conflicts and state terrorist acts have been ceaselessly occurred in different parts of the world against the expectation and desire of humankind for peace, and a logic of strength denying the sovereignty and equality in international relations has been connived at.
					
					 The member states of the UNSC including the U.S. have abused the UN as tool for realizing their interests through their privileged position in the UN.
					
					 As regards the Korean War, the name of UNSC was abused by the U.S. in the 1950s and the UNSC had never taken issue with the U.S. which has posed a nuclear threat to the DPRK for more than half a century. But it termed the DPRK's measures to bolster its self-defensive nuclear force as "a threat to world peace and security" and cooked up illegal and unreasonable "resolutions" one after another.
					
					 The arbitrary practice of the U.S., which has wantonly violated the UN Charter to use the UN for its dominationist aims for over seven decades, is getting worse after its president said that he would "totally destroy" a full-fledged UN member state in the sacred UN arena.
					
					 It is quite natural that the UN objective and principle have been trampled down, giving disappointment to the mankind desirous of peace as ignorant U.S., ringleader of aggression and war, still remains a member state of the UNSC.
					
					 The UN should fully discharge its mission and role as required by the times aspiring independence and the desire of mankind for peace and development.

articles.title: S. Korea: U.S.-S. Korea War Drills Protested
articles.content:
S. Korea: U.S.-S. Korea War Drills Protested
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Headquarters of Movement for People's Sovereignty and Removal of Evils in south Korea reportedly held a press conference outside the Taejon City Hall on Oct. 17 to protest against the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills targeting the DPRK.
					 Speakers at the conference charged that the U.S. is aggravating the war crisis by staging the joint naval drills with the mobilization of strategic assets.
					
					 They denounced that the authorities' policy of following the U.S. sanctions and pressure upon the north is little different from the policy pursued by the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 They urged the U.S. to lift the sanctions against the north and stop its hostile policy and war drills and take option to normalize the relations and conclude a peace treaty with the north.
					
					 They warned that the candlelight action of all the people would be intensified if their lives are exposed to more serious threat due to the U.S. moves to ignite a war on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Online Paper Urges Abolition of Police Evils
articles.content:
S. Korean Online Paper Urges Abolition of Police Evils
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo posted an editorial calling for the abolition of police evils on October 21.
					 The editorial recalled the fact that the prosecution released results of investigation into the death case of Paek Nam Gi on October 17 and the police promised to prevent the recurrence of such incident.
					
					 But the then director of the Police Agency really responsible for the case has not been prosecuted, it charged.
					
					 It denounced that the police has resorted to destruction of evidence, concealment and fabrication on the case till now.
					
					 The editorial stressed the need to dismiss the policemen associated with the evils and dissolve the security investigation team.

articles.title: Anniversary of Public Resistance for Democracy Observed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anniversary of Public Resistance for Democracy Observed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A rally reportedly took place in Changwon City of south Korea on October 18 on the lapse of 38 years since the October public resistance for achieving democracy broke out in Pusan and Masan in protest against the "yusin" fascist dictatorship.
					 Speakers at the rally called on the public to always remember the event and work hard to achieve democracy in the spirit of the resistance, true to the intention of the democratic martyrs.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website by Body of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website by Body of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo posted on its website the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is a Juche-Type Revolutionary Party Which Inherited the Glorious Tradition of the DIU" on Oct. 16 to mark the 91st anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The work, published on Oct. 17, Juche 71 (1982), clarifies that the Workers' Party of Korea is the revolutionary party that paved a path for its development and the Juche-type revolutionary party which conducts activities independently and creatively, guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 It deals with the position and role of the party in accomplishing the socialist cause.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A Bulgarian publishing house brought out in booklet "Let Us Usher in a Golden Age of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth Movement", a speech made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un at the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, on the occasion of the 72nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 In the speech made on Aug. 28, Juche 105 (2016), Kim Jong Un said that the 9th Congress was a congress of loyalty that demonstrated the faith and will of the young vanguard, a congress for general onward march that encouraged the young people to a vigorous drive for building a powerful socialist country, and a historic congress that provided a new milestone for the victorious advance of the youth movement of Juche and the development of the youth league.
					
					 He also advanced the tasks facing the youth league to usher in a golden age of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist youth movement.

articles.title: DPRK's Holidays in October Celebrated at Its Missions Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Holidays in October Celebrated at Its Missions Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Celebrations took place at the DPRK missions in Cuba, Cambodia and Equatorial Guinea on Oct. 3-10 to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, its 72nd birthday and the 91st anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Displayed at the events were photos showing the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also photos introducing the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 The president of the Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia noted that the WPK, founded and developed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, is making a series of thumping successes in the struggle to ensure peace and security on the Korean peninsula and build a prosperous and powerful country under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The vice-director of the International Department of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea and other speakers said that they extended support and solidarity to the cause of justice of the ever-victorious WPK, recalling that it has led the struggle of the Korean army and people along the road of glory for many years since its birth.

articles.title: DPRK's 70th Birthday to Be Marked in France
articles.content:
DPRK's 70th Birthday to Be Marked in France
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A French preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th birthday of the DPRK was formed on Oct. 2.
					 Honorary President Guy Dupre and President Benoit Quennedey of the France-Korea Friendship Association were elected as honorary chairman and chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Participantes en VI Conferencia Nacional de Juristas rinden homenaje a grandes lideres
articles.content:
Participantes en VI Conferencia Nacional de Juristas rinden homenaje a grandes lideres
Pyongyang, 24 de octubre (ACNC) -- Los participantes en la VI Conferencia Nacional de Juristas rindieron el dia 24 el homenaje postumo a los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il tras colocar un cesto y ramos de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce erguidas en la capitalina colina Mansu.

articles.title: EE.UU. y sus satelites no pueden asustar con presion a la RPDC, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
EE.UU. y sus satelites no pueden asustar con presion a la RPDC, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 24 de octubre (ACNC) -- En estos tiempos, los Estados Unidos y sus satelites andan desesperados para detener la marcha vigorosa de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, potencia nuclear del Juche. 
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico hoy un articulo individual que sigue:
					
					Ningun desafio agresivo puede asustar al pais socialista ni aflojar la firme voluntad de los militares y civiles coreanos de cumplir la historica causa de construccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado frustrando las tentativas de guerra nuclear y la campana de sancion y presion de los enemigos mediante la implementacion de la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					Ahora las fuerzas hostiles piensan mal que la RPDC se pondra de rodillas si redobla la presion en todos los dominios como el militar y el economico. 
					
					Cuanto mas brutales se tornen las maniobras de EE.UU. para provocar la guerra nuclear, tanto mas fuerte sera la voluntad del ejercito y pueblo coreanos de consolidar por todos los medios el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa.
					
					Ademas, se cumplira a la mayor velocidad la meta de completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado. 
					
					Es inconmovible la conviccion de los militares y civiles coreanos de impulsar con dinamismo la construccion de una potencia socialista manteniendo firmemente la linea de desarrollo paralelo bajo cualesquier circunstancias y dificultades.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela la situacion real de las fuerzas norteamericanas
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela la situacion real de las fuerzas norteamericanas
Pyongyang, 24 de octubre (ACNC) -- El periodico Minju Joson divulgo hoy un comentario individual revelando la situacion real de las tropas norteamericanas que se ufanan de ser el "ejercito mas poderoso del mundo".
					Este calificativo lujoso fue desmentido por el resultado de la reciente encuesta sobre los marineros del crucero Shiloh perteneciente a la septima flota norteamericana, precisa el comentarista y continua:
					
					Con el panico, inquietud y descontento, los marineros citados respondieron asi: "es una cuestion de tiempo la llegada de un suceso terrible", "parece que estamos en la cancha del estadio para ver que es lo que se rompe primero entre el buque y su tripulacion" y "nos la da sensacion de estar encerrados en una carcel flotante".
					
					La septima flota norteamericana es el componente clave del Sistema Antimisiles de EE.UU. 
					
					A pesar de su mision pomposa, sus marineros sufren hipocondria y pavor y hasta intentan suicidarse por verse obligados a servir en las delicadas zonas maritimas.
					
					Por otra parte, se arma escandalo entre la poblacion civil de EE.UU. que construye el refugio antiaereo subterraneo y compra caretas antigases para eludir la muerte tragica.
					
					Es muy ridiculo que Trump y los demas gobernantes de EE.UU. intentaran "destruir totalmente" a la RPDC, potencia dignificada, sin tomar en consideracion la miserable situacion de casa.

articles.title: Son indelebles los crimenes inhumanos del imperialismo japones, insiste Minju Joson
articles.content:
Son indelebles los crimenes inhumanos del imperialismo japones, insiste Minju Joson
Pyongyang, 24 de octubre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, tuvo lugar en Manhattan de Nueva York la ceremonia de develamiento de la estatua de nina esclava sexual para el viejo ejercito japones que se ha levantado por cuarta vez despues de California, Michigan y Georgia.
					Este hecho demuestra que los reaccionarios japoneses no pueden borrar de ninguna manera su historia criminal ni lo tolera la sociedad internacional. 
					
					Reitera asi el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					
					Al ver con disgusto que se levantan una tras otra en EE.UU., pais aliado de Japon, las estatuas de ese tipo que simbolizan la esclavitud sexual para el viejo ejercito japones, las autoridades japonesas se valieron de todos los medios y metodos para eliminarlas.
					
					Pero, pasaron tremenda pena en la arena internacional mientras trataban de alcanzar ese objetivo con miserables sumas de dinero. 
					
					La verdadera intencion de los reaccionarios japoneses reside en prevenir la presion internacional por la liquidacion del pasado de Japon. 
					
					Lo mas ridiculo es que ellos piensan todavia que podrian dejar en el olvido de la historia sus crimenes del pasado. 
					
					En particular, el caso de esclavitud sexual deviene un insulto y la negativa total a la humanidad y un desafio a la justicia y la conciencia. 
					
					Por muy desesperados que se pongan los reaccionarios japoneses, seran condenados duro por la historia por sus delitos de lesa humanidad.
